#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 1e5+5;
char a[maxn][2];
int w[maxn], l[500], c[500];
int main(){
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0); cin.tie(0); cout.tie(0);
	int t; cin >> t;
	while(t--){
		int n, k; cin >> n >> k;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			string s; cin >> s;
			a[i][0] = s[0]; a[i][1] = s[s.length()-1];
		}
		memset(l,0,sizeof l); memset(w,0,sizeof w); memset(c,0,sizeof c);

		for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--){
			if(i+k+1<n) c[a[i+k+1][0]]--;
			if(i+k+1<n && w[i+k+1]) l[a[i+k+1][0]]--;
			w[i] = l[a[i][1]] == 0;
			c[a[i][0]]++;
			if(w[i]) l[a[i][0]]++;
			// cout << i << " " << w[i] << endl;
			// for(int j='a';j<='z';j++) cout << c[j] << ":" << l[j] << " ";
			// cout << endl;
		}
		int ans = 0;
		for(int i=0;i<min(k,n);i++) if(w[i]){
			ans = 1; break;
		}
		if(ans) cout << "Alex\n";
		else cout << "Bob\n";
	}
}
